subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: On Sunday, Padraig Harrington, who shot a round of 67 for a total of 10-under-par 200, will go head- to head with the unofficial lord of the Firestone manor, Tiger Woods.
snippet: On Sunday, Padraig Harrington, who shot a round of 67 for a total of 10-under-par 200, will go head- to head with the unofficial lord of the Firestone manor, Tiger Woods.
